tool.name: OGS: convertGEO
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'convertGEO'.

param.name: input_file
param.label: input file
param.help: the geometry file to be converted

param.name: output_file
param.label: output file
param.help: the new geometry file whose file format is guessed from its file extension

param.name: gmsh_path
param.label: gmsh path
param.help: the path to the gmsh binary

tool.help: This tool runs the **convertGEO** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
